text:
This release has truly caused me heartburn.  Whenever I try to load a context 
using the ISAPI redirector (so I don't have to use a port number) and the file 
in the context that I'm trying to load does not end in .jsp I receive a 404.  
This is a major blocker.  I really don't want to go through and rename a 
hundred files to .jsp and incur additionaly overhead just so this will work.  
The previous release that I was on was 4.0.3 and it had no problems like this.  
Please tell me this is a config setting somewhere.  I really don't want to back 
out this release if at all possible.
creator: grenoml@yahoo.com

text: AFAIK, this works. Please include details that would allow to reproduce the problem.
creator: remm@apache.org
